description: Engine-specific processing queries that shape the resulting data.

Sql.description: Transform using one of the SQL dialects.

engine.description: Identifier of the engine used for this transformation.

version.description: Version of the engine to use.

query.description: SQL query the result of which will be used as an output. This is a convenience property meant only for defining queries by hand. When stored in the metadata this property will never be set and instead will be converted into a single-iter `queries` array.

queries.description: Use this instead of query field for specifying multi-step SQL transformations. Each step acts as a shorthand for `CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW <alias> AS (<query>)`.

temporalTables.description: Temporary Flink-specific extension for creating temporal tables from streams.
